title: Virtual Assistant – Prospect Research, Logo/Image Collection & Data Entry
job_overview:
Hello!

We will begin with a 1-week, paid trial to ensure we make a good team that works well together. We will start with 10 hours per week, and we hope to be able to increase the hours as our business grows.

Part-Time | Remote | Flexible Hours
We are seeking a detail-oriented and tech-savvy Virtual Assistant to support a research-based data entry project focused on identifying and qualifying prospective clients in Central Texas (regions will expand over time). This role is ideal for someone who enjoys internet research, organizing files and spreadsheets, and working independently with a high standard of accuracy.

Role Overview:
You will be responsible for prospecting and qualifying pool companies in Central Texas that have an outdated website or no website. You will be gathering key business information, collecting branding assets (logos and example images of their work), organizing files in Google Drive, and entering all data and hyperlinks into a shared Google Spreadsheet. (We are starting with pool companies, but will be incorporating other types of companies/services soon.)

Key Responsibilities:

1. Prospecting & Qualifying
Identify prospective pool-related businesses (companies, owners, and independent contractors) in Central Texas cities and towns, including: Austin, Round Rock, Cedar Park, Leander, Georgetown, Liberty Hill, San Antonio, Waco, Temple, Belton, Salado, Jarrell, Buda, Kyle, San Marcos, Lockhart, and New Braunfels.

Confirm that each business is currently active by reviewing recent posts, reviews, or updates. Please do not contact them.

Input accurate business details into the tracking spreadsheet:
Company Name
Owner/Manager Contact
Phone Number 
Email
Website URL (if any)
Google Maps Link
Social Media Links (please double-check and ensure they are accurate)


2. Logo & Image Collection
Collect publicly available company logos and 3–5 high-quality images showing their best work from the business website, LinkedIn, Google Business Profile, Facebook, or other sources.

Ensure all Logos are clear and not blurry.

Ensure all Example Images are of sparkling clean, high-end pools with nice landscaping - images that are in focus with vibrant colors and good framing/composition.

Ensure all images are saved as JPG files at the highest available resolution.

Upload:
Logos ----> Company Logos folder in Google Drive
Example Images ----> Company Examples folder in Google Drive.

Name files consistently:
Logos: CompanyName_Upgrade to see actual infog
Images: CompanyName_1.jpg, CompanyName_2.jpg, etc.

Generate and copy Google Drive share links for the Company Logo and each of the Example Images.

Paste them into the appropriate columns in the shared spreadsheet as hyperlinked text (e.g., CompanyName_Logo, CompanyName_1, etc.)


Required Skills & Tools:
Google Workspace: Google Drive, Google Sheets, basic file sharing, and link generation
Internet research skills
Basic file sharing & hyperlink generation
Familiarity with downloading images and verifying social media links
Attention to detail and consistent naming/organization
Basic understanding of image file formats (JPG required)

Hours & Flexibility:
Flexible schedule - work when it suits you!
Hourly-based, with potential for ongoing work depending on quality and reliability

What We Value:
Accuracy, consistency, and independence
Mindful of time and driven to finish efficiently without rushing or sacrificing quality
Good communication and responsiveness
Problem-solving and resourcefulness (e.g., finding the Company’s high-quality logo and example images if not on their website or if they don’t have a website)

To Apply:
Please include a brief note about your experience with similar research or data entry tasks, your availability, and why you know you are a good fit for this project. Applications without an introduction note will, unfortunately, not be considered.

If you have any questions, please include them with your submission.

Thank you very much! We are looking forward to hearing from you!
